meta.title: Home
meta.keywords: indoor cycling, indoor cycle, interactive bike, streaming classes, virtual classes, stryde, stryde bike, virtual workouts

addToCartSection.title: Stryde exercise bike
addToCartSection.description: Bring home high performance cardio machine with immersive access to Stryde classes and other interactive content

firstParagraph.title: Workouts that push you
firstParagraph.description: Performance to beat-based choreography, and classes from beginner riders to advanced riders

secondParagraph.title: Nation’s Top Instructors
secondParagraph.description: We’ve partnered with the country’s most popular cycling studios and independent instructors delivering a wide variety of on and off the bike workouts.

thirdParagraph.title: Popular Hits to Suit Every Taste
thirdParagraph.description: From latest hits to 80s, trust our instructors will find the beats to get you going

companyTestimonialSection.forbes: “Of all the Peloton competitors, Stryde has the most unique and compellingly different approach”
companyTestimonialSection.businessInsider: “Is, quite simply, a joy to ride. The design is thoughtful, sleek, and supremely sturdy”
companyTestimonialSection.filtrated: “Even without a subscription, the Stryde Bike can still be used for training at home. It’s win-win.”
companyTestimonialSection.mensHealth: “This Interactive Home Cycling Bike Seriously Rivals Peloton”
companyTestimonialSection.enterpreneur: “Of all the Peloton competitors, Stryde has the most unique and compellingly different approach”

featuredAppSection.title: STRYDE DIGITAL APP
featuredAppSection.description: Nation’s top instructors who challenge, encourage and entertain you with the broadest selection of quality on and off the bike workouts that will push your full body.

mainSection.descriptionFirst: Immersive cardio and strength workouts - on a high performance bike starting at $50 a month.
mainSection.descriptionSecond: Or try Stryde digital app - start now with 14 day trial.

testimonials.content: I love the movements and overall work for my body.
testimonials.name: Jesse K.

testimonials.content: “SO MUCH ENERGY. I have not found a single class that didn’t give me the energy to push myself.”
testimonials.name: Kara W.

testimonials.content: “I work a lot harder with Stryde. Big difference”
testimonials.name: Pat H.

areyoureadySection.title: Are you ready to ride?
areyoureadySection.financingContent: *This example payment based on the listed product price assuming a 36 month term loan and a 9.99% APR. Your terms may vary and are subject to credit approval. Down payment may be required. Rates range from 6.99% to 29.99% APR. Bread® loans are made by Cross River Bank, a New Jersey Chartered Bank, Member FDIC.
